text: is there a good way to get the julia code from a given function name? `@which` is feasible but maybe hacky?

elements.text: is there a good way to get the julia code from a given function name?

text: Generally speaking, function name isn't sufficient, you need also the type of the arguments

Code tracking has some fancier stuff but its very similar to whats in Base. This will work though thank you!

text:
On Ubuntu you can set a key to make accents and do something like Ctrl Right -> e -> `
You need to enable it somewhere
